title: Inquiry about Sports Club Membership
english_text:
Dear Sir or Madam,

I am writing to ask for information about joining your sports club. I am a new student in the area and I am very interested in keeping fit.

Could you please tell me how much the monthly membership fee is? I would also like to know your opening hours, especially during the weekends. Do you have a swimming pool and tennis courts? Finally, I am a full-time student, so I was wondering if you offer any student discounts.

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Yours faithfully,

Chris Wang
chinese_translation:
尊敬的先生或女士：

我写信是为了咨询关于加入你们体育俱乐部的信息。我是一名刚到这个地区的学生，对保持健康非常感兴趣。

请问每月的会员费是多少？我也想知道你们的营业时间，特别是周末的。你们有游泳池和网球场吗？最后，我是一名全日制学生，所以我想知道你们是否提供任何学生折扣。

我期待尽快收到您的回复。

诚挚地，

克里斯·王

title: My Favorite Hobby: Painting
english_text:
What’s your favorite way to relax? For me, it’s painting. I started painting two years ago, and it has become my greatest passion. I love using bright colors to create pictures of landscapes and animals. It feels like I’m creating my own little world.

Every weekend, I spend a few hours in my room with my brushes and paints. It helps me forget all my stress from school. Painting has taught me to be patient and to see the beauty in everything around me. It’s a wonderful hobby that I think everyone should try!
chinese_translation:
你最喜欢的放松方式是什么？对我来说，是绘画。我两年前开始画画，它已经成为我最大的热情所在。我喜欢用鲜艳的色彩来创作风景和动物的图画。感觉就像我在创造自己的小世界。

每个周末，我都会在我的房间里花几个小时用我的画笔和颜料画画。它帮助我忘记所有来自学校的压力。绘画教会了我耐心，也让我看到了周围一切事物的美。这是一个很棒的爱好，我认为每个人都应该尝试一下！
